page.title: 16LEISURE AMENITIES: WARLEY
page.content: The main leisure facilities, apart from Public Houses in Great Warley, are to be found in a large{golf course (Club House 598904), the various {woodlands}(although there is only a public right of way through one of these - 5992), Tyler's Common 5690, now uncomfortably close to the M25 and certain{riding stables}where lessons may be taken. Outdoor sports are played on the common, and people occasionally walk through the woods - although most drive through them at high speed. Most leisure activities are undoubtedly pursued outside the block, however, in one of the {surrounding urban areas}of Brentwood, Upminster, Romford or Harold Wood, all of which have Sports' Centres; or else in{London}itself, easily accessible by train (31 minutes from Brentwood), less easily by car.
